summary:
My entire career has been developed in finance departments. I have been working in Treasury, Accounts Receivable, Accounts Payable, retail accounting (General Ledger), controlling the accounting of all of them as assistant controller and at the present time I am the manager of the Business Accounting team responsible for all  the accounting and processes related to margin (revenue & COGS). I am also leading the subsidy management.

These experiences together with the knowledge acquired by my studies (Degree, Bachelor and Master on Business Administration/Finance/Audit) makes me an ideal candidate for a job position such a Finance Controller, Accounting Manager, AP Manager, Business Analyst, Financial Analyst, or GL Accountant. I have experience with USGAAP, spanish GAAP, italian GAAP, and IFRS.

The managerial skills developed in the two last positions, where I have reporting to me a group consisting of 14 people, and the experience gained from the 11 years when I was football referee, provide me the capacity to be a good manager able to deal with my colleagues by listening  and analyzing the situation in order to take the best decisions.

I have affinity with operating systems such as SAP, SAP BI, BEX Analyzer, Analysis for Office, Cognos, JBA, Hyperion, Oracle BI, Essbase, BPC, Nakisa, Sharepoint and advanced Excel skills. In addition, I had experience working in different cultural environments, which helped me to overcome any cultural barriers and made me a good team player.  I also possess good communication skills in both English and Spanish. Due to my international education and experience, I became an employee who can easily adapt into new organizations and projects. I am passionate about new challenges.

profile_positions.description:
Assist the Senior controller in the full-cycle accounting as well as in the
monthly/annual end close. Responsible for two entities (mainly Calvin Klein stores) in all
aspects of the financial process from recording of entries in the financial
system to reporting for USGAAP purposes and Italian GAAP purposes.

Detailed tasks:
• Bookings in GL:
  - Concession channel sales
  - Prepaid (insurance,rents,service charges,prof. fees, credit card, utilities, comunication, temp. help, audit fees...)
  - Accruals (insurance,rents,service charges,prof. fees, credit card, utilities, comunication, temp. help,audit fees...)
  - Purchases
  - Key money
  - Capital contribution
  - Fixed Assets
  - Payroll and other incentives
  - Deferred rent
  - Dilution
  - IC loans´ interest
  - Impairment
• Intercompany reconciliation
• Turnover rent calculation
• Monthly reconciliation of balance accounts of Calvin Klein Italy
• Control of 52 Calvin Klein stores:
  - Sales
  - COGS
  - SGA
• Support to prepare the forecast (LTF) and budget
• Reporting:
  - Variance Analysis
  - 10Q
  - Financial statements
• Assisting internal and external auditors with:
  - SOX procedures
  - Annual accounting reconciliations

profile_positions.description:

  - Purchases
  - Stock transfers

  - Petty cash
  - Bank movements
• Cash reconciliation
• Turnover rent calculation
• Reconciliation of balance accounts of Calvin Klein Ireland
• Bookings related to Calvin Klein Ireland:
  - Fix Assets depreciation
  - Payroll
  - Prepaids
  - Concession sales
• Preparing forecast and budget for 40 calvin Klein stores in UK
• Assisting internal and external auditors with:
  - SOX procedures

  - Annual accounting reconciliations
